titleStmt.title: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa
titleStmt.author: mi nyag blo gros grags pa

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

physDesc.additional: Script: dpe tshugs. Missing folios: fol. 49 and fol. 83. On the cover page, the number 342 is written above the title to the left of the signature phyi dza 1.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rnaM par bshad pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba 'di | mdo'i dang rgyudrgyu sde mtha' dag la
dbang 'byor pas daM pa'i chos 'chad pa dang rtsod pa dang rtsoM pa'i tshul la spobs pa dge' btsan ¦ mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje rmad du byung ba mnga' ba ye shes rdo rje dpal bzang po zhes bya ba'i bka' drin las lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud pa mang du thos pa shakya'i dge slong
blo gros grags pa zhes bgyi bas || dge' ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos nan chen pos This could also be an abbreviation of "chen po nas" yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor du || shing pho spre'u 'i chu stod gyi zla ba'i tshe 1 la || mkhas pa'i skye bo du ma'i bsti gnas dam pa ra ti dga' ldan gyi chos grags chen por nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig
rdzogs s+ho || 'dis 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho chen po myur du skeMs par gyur 1 || dge'o || ||
